channel.title: Searching for a tut on where items are worn
channel.description: I searched it a few times and kept getting no results. Any tuts or help? [code]item = 3767 Fremennik_shirt The_latest_in_Fremennik_fashion.[/code] Im trying to make this a shirt, Right now it is a weapon.

to be more specific item.java and search for booleans for the cape you search for public static int capes[] = {then you add the items id to whichever slot you want it in.
